about_the_game:
Unleash mayhem as a power-hungry troll who just can’t stop “helping” humans by gifting them chaotic powers! Every NPC is a one-of-a-kind character with a random look, personality, and unpredictable reactions. Your mission? Grant them bizarre abilities, throw items around, and watch the madness unfold as they struggle to deal with their newfound powers. Each level is a fresh sandbox of supernatural chaos—how much trouble can one troll create?

Controls:

  • Move - WASD or Arrow Keys

  • Jump - Space

  • Pick Up/Throw - P

Core Features:

  • Power Chaos: Give random, often absurd powers to NPCs and watch them react in unpredictable ways.

  • Unique NPCs: Each character has a distinct look, unique dialogue, and an attitude that shifts based on your actions.

  • Dynamic Reactions: NPCs respond to your powers, their surroundings, and each other, making every playthrough feel new and surprising.

  • Pixelated Mayhem: Enjoy a retro-inspired world where your troll antics come to life in delightful detail.

Ready to stir up some trouble? Dive in, experiment with powers, and see just how much chaos you can cause!
